title: Overcoming Your Fears About Money
itunes:summary:
In a marriage, each spouse tends to have different priorities when it comes to money. In the same way, husbands and wives usually have different fears regarding finances. John Fuller and Erin Smalley offer thoughts for overcoming money fears as a couple. Featuring Jeff and Shaunti Feldhahn.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Jeff and Shaunti Feldhahn's book "Thriving in Love & Money" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-06-22?refcd=1113805

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/overcoming-your-fears-about-money/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
